metadata.synopsis: The Player is fighting on the side of the drider against the Harpers. The Players just picked up the lantern that Harper Lassandra wants.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Join ambush combat on the side of the drider.Kill or disarm the drider so he drops the lantern.Loot and equip the lantern.Observe AD from Harper Lassandra

0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
0.context: InternalNodeContext: cultist' refers to the player - could be any gender
